attributes.action: Send police in groups into areas of gang activity with instant stop and search and arrest powers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today people, both teenage and older hold some degree of fear from teenage 'chav' gangs. Despite all efforts to curve and destroy these gangs they remain in existence and innocent bystanders like Garry Newlove will continue to be harmed and even killed unless the back bone of the gangs is broken
